title: Record Sleeve, "R.E.M., Sex Bomb", 1994
description: Green, gold, and black, inks on cardboard packaging.  on right border "SEX" in bold green fron surrounded by smaller "sex" words repeated in gold font.  On top border "BOMB" in bold green font surrounded by smaller "bomb" words repeated in gold font.  At center right "BABY" in green font surrounded by smaller "baby" words in gold font in swirling pattern.  On bottom of cover"YEAH!"  in black font surrounded by smaller "yeah" words in gold font.  At center "r.e.m." in black font.

tombstone.epitaph:
Record Sleeve, "R.E.M., Sex Bomb", 1994.
1994. printed cardboard. Gift of Independent Project Press. 1997-161-6.
